column4: Can anybody tell me the name of the application that gets run when I select the "networking" gui tool under administration in Ubuntuu? I am not at the machine right now but I want to run it remotely
I just have no idea what it is called
tab completion is your friend;  gnome-<tab><tab><tab> until you see it :)
actually that was the wrong one. do you know what the name of the ethernet (or network) device configuration tool is?
try the other one, there's two that start with gnome-net
network-admin is the one you're looking for
it is not the right one
ok... please tell me how I can rememdy this seemingly awful situation... can I just do an apt-get install php_mysql right now and it will add mysql support to the php I already installed?
assuming that it's the right package, yes
there is a package like that though that you need
